Docs.summary: Provides access to the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of a SOAP type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetXsdType() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
